name: AWS-Code-Build
description: Integration with AWS Code Build API.

settings.name: accessKeyId
settings.description: The access key ID of the default user to use to authenticate to AWS.

settings.name: secretAccessKey
settings.description: The access key secret of the default user to use to authenticate to AWS.

settings.name: region
settings.description: The default AWS region to make requests on.

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: The access key ID of the user to use to authenticate to AWS for this request.

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: The access key secret of the user to use to authenticate to AWS for this request.

params.name: region
params.description: The AWS region to make this request on.

params.name: project
params.description: The Code Build project to build.

params.name: sourceVersion
params.description: The version of the build input to be built, for this build only. If not specified, the latest version is used. Expected value depands on type of source code for this project.

params.name: debugSessionEnabled
params.description: Specifies if session debugging is enabled for this build.

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: The access key ID of the user to use to authenticate to AWS for this request.

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: The access key secret of the user to use to authenticate to AWS for this request.

params.name: region
params.description: The AWS region to make this request on.

params.name: project
params.description: The Code Build project of the build to stop.

params.name: build
params.description: The build to stop.

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: The access key ID of the user to use to authenticate to AWS for this request.

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: The access key secret of the user to use to authenticate to AWS for this request.

params.name: region
params.description: The AWS region to make this request on.

params.name: project
params.description: The Code Build project of the builds to get information about.

params.name: builds
params.description: The build(s) to stop. Can specify multiple builds by passing an array of builds to return information about.

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: The access key ID of the user to use to authenticate to AWS for this request.

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: The access key secret of the user to use to authenticate to AWS for this request.

params.name: region
params.description: The AWS region to make this request on.

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: The access key ID of the user to use to authenticate to AWS for this request.

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: The access key secret of the user to use to authenticate to AWS for this request.

params.name: region
params.description: The AWS region to make this request on.

params.name: project
params.description: If specified, only return builds of this project.
